resources.string: My name is Ishan, and I am a computer science student at UMass Lowell. I will be graduating this Summer 2023. This is verison 1.0 of the game and the goal of the game is to switch off all the lights with as few moves as possible.

The game will start with random number of lights turned on. Click on any light and it will toggle that light and the adjacent lights. To win the game, all lights must be turned off with as few moves as possible. To change the light color, click on the settings icon on top right and choose a new color.
